result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dante J Saal

defendant.name: Saal, Dante J
defendant.address: 100 Corrections Drive, Stanley Correctional Institution, Stanley, WI 54768

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Dante J Saal appeared by video, in custody from Stanley Correctional.  Attorney Adrian W Longacre appeared by video for Dante J Saal.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

THIS COVERS 22CF10, 22CF16, 22CF38, 22CM18, 21CT87, 22FO153, and 22FO154. 

Defendant waives right to in person appearance and wishes to proceed via zoom video. Court accepts the waiver. 

22CF10- Defendant pleads guilty to count 1. Court accepts the plea and finds the defendant guilty. Counts 2 and 3 are dismissed and read-in. 
22CF16 - Dismissed and read-in. 
22CF38 - State moves to amend to remove the repeater in counts 1 and 2. Court grants amendments. Defendant pleads guilty to counts 1 and 2. Court accepts and finds guilty. Counts 3 and 4 is dismissed and read-in. 
22CM18- Dismissed and read-in. 
21CT87 - Dismissed and read-in. 
22FO153 - Defendant pleads no contest. Court accepts the plea and finds the Defendant guilty. 
                  Court orders a $200.50 forfeiture with 60 days to pay or payment plan and $681.87 restitution to Horton Hardware in Chetek. A judgment will be entered at the end of the 60 days if a payment plan 
                  has not been completed. 
22FO154 - Dismissed and read-in. 

Court orders PSI. Both sides will be free to argue at sentencing. Bonds revoked. Defendant will speak with Attorney Longacre regarding appearance for sentencing. 

CC: BC Jail

3:02 P.M. Defendant Dante J Saal appeared by video, in custody at Stanley Correctional.  Attorney Adrian W Longacre appeared by video for Dante J Saal. Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin.   Court Reporter appeared by Zoom video means. 
COVERS 21CT87, 22CF10, 22CF16, 22CF38, 22CM18, 22FO153 & 22FO154.
Attorney Longacre relates there will be an agreement and requests reset.  State relates on Plea with PSI ordered.  All files reset in front of Judge Boyle for 08/25/2022 at 1:00 p.m. for 1/2 hour for Plea date.  JA to set up Zoom video from Stanley.  Bonds will continue.
Plea hearing scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
